title: 527 West 110th Street #34
description:
**AVAILABLE FOR AN AUGUST 1st START DATE**

Gorgeous 2 bedroom at the “Britannia Condominium”, at 110th Street and Broadway, 5 minutes to Columbia University, 1/2 block to the 1 train, 2 blocks to Central Park and Riverside Park and surrounded by fabulous shopping and restaurants. Tastefully renovated with thoughtful finishes throughout featuring an open kitchen with quartz counters and stainless steel appliances. Apartment was upgraded yet maintains many of the unique prewar details-refinished hardwood oak floors, 9+ foot ceilings, over-sized windows and pristine woodwork and moldings throughout. One king-sized bedroom and an additional queen-size second bedroom. Washer & Dryer in unit! Meticulously maintained, boutique prewar building with a part-time doorman, resident manager, central laundry room and storage.

title: 605 West 111st Street #63
description:
Located in the vibrant Morningside Heights neighborhood, just a short walk from Columbia University, this beautiful, spacious 2-bedroom, 1-bathroom apartment is a true gem. Boasting a generous layout, the interior features open spaces with clean lines that create an inviting atmosphere. Each room offers ample space for relaxation and creativity, while the modern kitchen and bathroom are designed for both functionality and comfort. The apartment is filled with natural light, enhancing its warm ambiance and making it the perfect place for you to settle down and call home.

This charming residence at 605 West 11th Street is housed within a beautifully preserved co-op building, originally constructed in 1905 and showcasing the elegant Beaux-Arts architectural style. The Markenfield, as the building is known, rises gracefully over six stories and is home to fifty-two units. Its rich history and meticulously maintained fa ade radiates a sense of timeless charm.

With the amenities, you'll find the convenience of a resident superintendent dedicated to ensuring the upkeep of the building. Additional amenities include a secure bike room for cycling enthusiasts and a well-equipped laundry room that adds to the apartment's practicality. This apartment offers the perfect blend of historic elegance and modern convenience, making it an ideal place to create lasting memories.

About Morningside Heights: Its boundaries extend from Riverside Drive to Morningside Park and from 110th Street to 125th Street.

Once referred to as the Academic Acropolis of Manhattan due to its numerous scholarly institutions-Columbia University, Barnard College, the Manhattan School of Music, Teachers College, and the Cathedral of St. John the Divine, the world's largest Gothic church, to name a few-Morningside Heights is also culturally rich in commerce. The area boasts many cafes, restaurants, entertainment venues, open-air markets, and specialty shops.

Convenient subway stations, such as the #1 at 110th and Broadway, the B and C lines at 110th and Central Park West, and the crosstown bus at 110th and Broadway, make this location ideal for reaching all areas of the city.

Please, no pets of any kind.

title: 101 West End Avenue #8S
description:
*Classic finish, oversized 1 bedroom residence available at 101 West End!*


101 West End Avenue is a renovated, luxury building with beautiful design features, conveniently located in the cultural center of Lincoln Center, in the Upper West Side. Exceptional, detailed finishes and the highest level of elegant craftsmanship are noticeable in every corner of the apartments. Because the renovations were done from floor to ceiling, every aspect of the units can be considered brand new. The uniquely large layouts throughout the building are a sophisticated style that makes the area one of the most influential in the city. And the modern features within each home add comfort and ease to everyday living. The sizable windows generate abundant natural light and all units contain stainless steel and energy star appliances, quartz countertops, dishwashers, microwaves, wine refrigerators, and custom cabinetry.

The building is near both Riverside and Central Parks, Lincoln Center, and the multitude of high-end shopping and retail including The Apple Store, Time Warner Center, Trader Joe's, Zabar's, and Whole Foods. The building will also undergo major renovations and improvements including the addition of 7,000 square feet of communal multi-purpose terrace space and 7,650 square feet of new amenities space. Enjoy the abundant cultural advantages of the area while experiencing the comfort of spacious living in one of New Yorks most coveted neighborhoods.

*Lifestyle Amenities*

*Convenience*
101 West End offers a 24/7 staffed front desk concierge, a live-in super and management on-site. In addition, a package room and in-house valet service available: Wash & Fold, Dry Cleaning, expert tailoring and housekeeping are at your fingertips. The building has recently undergone major renovations and improvements including the addition of 7,000 square feet of communal multi-purpose terrace space and 7,650 square feet of new amenities space.

*Dermot Ignite Club & Community*
When you are ready to unwind, 101 West End offers the exclusive Dermot Ignite Club. Members can experience a full, socially-interactive community. Our in-house managed amenity & social club provides events regularly, such as Game Nights, cooking and mixology classes taught by well-heeled professionals, wellness events, happy hours, movie screenings and much more.

*Dermot Ignite Fit*
A variety of equipment is provided throughout the 5,000 square feet of state-of-the-art Dermot Ignite Fit space, including a Smith Machine, Stairmaster, heavy-weight bags, kettlebells, medicine balls, a half basketball court on-site, and much more.

*Dermot Ignite Lounge & Dermot Ignite Play*
The spacious Residents Lounge with its vaulted ceilings and floor to ceiling windows, invites our members to generous seating and study/workspace for all to enjoy. For the younger generation, the kids room offers a jungle-gym and slide, building blocks, and a variety of fun and educational games.

*Dermot Ignite Rooftop*
Members have access to our rooftop, accessible through the Residents Lounge, which features large BBQ grills, picnic and patio furniture showcase lovely views of Midtown Manhattan, and the Hudson River.

*Dermot Ignite Conference*
All amenity areas are equipped with free Wi-Fi. Additionally, two separate conference rooms, as well as individual study rooms, allow for privacy in a professional setting.

*Our Neighborhood*
The neighborhood is our unspoken amenity. Near both Riverside and Central Parks, Lincoln Center, and the multitude of high-end shopping and retail including The Apple Store, Time Warner Center, Trader Joe's, Zabar's, and Whole Foods. Both the 1 train at 66th street and Columbus Circle are each within walking distance to take you wherever you need to go in the city!

Photos reflect the same finishes and fixtures but may be of a different apartment in the building.

title: 21 West End Avenue #2409
open_house_desc: Sat, Apr 5 (10:00 AM - 5:00 PM, by appt. only)
description:
Generous Studio featuring lavish closet space in the new and modern 21 West End Ave building, located in the thriving cultural center of the Upper West Side. 

Cutting-edge, designer interiors feature extensive layouts, Canadian white oak floors, and floor to ceiling windows, generating an abundance of natural light. Modern kitchens have custom millwork, marble countertops and floors, walnut stained cabinetry and state-of-the-art stainless steel Kitchenaid appliances. All units contain Bosch washers and dryers, truly generous closet space, including a walk-in the Master bedrooms and over nine foot ceilings. Residents will also enjoy direct exposure to the Hudson River and panoramic city vistas. The building will host the prestigious EOS program with unparalleled amenities, as an extension to the home, offering the highest caliber of service catering to residents every need. 


*Lifestyle Amenities*

*Convenience*
21 West End offers a 24/7 staffed front desk concierge, a live-in super and management on-site. In addition, a package room and in-house valet service are available: Wash & Fold, Dry Cleaning, and housekeeping are at your fingertips. This is just the start of what 21 West End has to offer!

*Dermot Ignite Club & Community*
When you are ready to unwind, 21 West End offers the exclusive Dermot Ignite Club. Members can experience a full, socially-interactive community. Our in-house managed amenity & social club provides events, such as Game Nights, cooking and mixology classes taught by well-heeled professionals, wellness events, happy hours, movie screenings and much more; and all amenity areas are equipped with free Wi-Fi

*Dermot Ignite Fit & Pool*
The Dermot Ignite Fit facility is complete with a yoga studio, kick-boxing room, state of the art exercise machines, including but not limited to Peloton Bikes, a Smith Machine, and Stairmaster to name a few. The indoor pool facility is designed to be an active retreat for the whole family. While offering restorative hot baths, sauna, lounge space for adults, its also a fun place for the kids to play and enjoy the built-in cinema screen for feature entertainment.

*Dermot Ignite Lounge & Dermot Ignite Play*
The spacious Residents Lounge with its vaulted ceilings invites our members to generous seating and study/workspace for all to enjoy. For the younger generation, the indoor playscape is home to a larger than-life stegosaurus that is sure to get the kids pumped. Soft surfaces, fun shapes, and bright colors create a year-round social space and home base during rainy days. Even better, low-lying windows built into the bookshelves look into the dog run for fun peekaboo moments for both the pups and kids!

*Dermot Ignite Rooftop*
The rooftop terrace is your exclusive backyard, where you can gather with friends and neighbors. Grills, heaters, lounge-seating, and a lawn are met with an amazing view of the Hudson River. The indoor section includes a full demo kitchen perfect for catered private events making you the ultimate host!

*Dermot Ignite Multi-purpose Room, Wine Cellar & Golf Simulator*
The wine cellar hosts tastings and has climate-controlled lockers for resident use. There is a golf-simulator, a private club room, and a private dining room with a hosting kitchen for your next dinner party.

*Dermot Ignite Dog Spa & Dog Run*
The indoor dog spa and dog run are amazing areas for rainy days and cold winter weather. Doggie Daycare is offered during the weekdays for you 4-legged companions to make friends of their own!

*Our Neighborhood*
The neighborhood is our unspoken amenity. Right across the street is Harrys Table, and Empellon Taqueria for a lovely lunch or dinner experience. Both Riverside and Central Parks, Lincoln Center, and the multitude of high-end shopping and retail including The Apple Store, Time Warner Center, Trader Joe's, Zabar's, Lululemon, and Whole Foods. And a variety of trains such as the 1, A, C, B, D conveniently located within walking distance at Columbus Circle to take you wherever you need to go in the city!

description:
Cutting-edge, designer interiors feature extensive layouts, Canadian white oak floors, and floor to ceiling windows, generating an abundance of natural light. Modern kitchens have custom millwork, marble countertops and floors, walnut stained cabinetry and state-of-the-art stainless steel Kitchenaid appliances. All units contain Bosch washers and dryers, truly generous closet space, including a walk-in the Master bedrooms and over nine foot ceilings. Residents will also enjoy direct exposure to the Hudson River and panoramic city vistas. The building will host the prestigious Dermot Ignite program with unparalleled amenities, as an extension to the home, offering the highest caliber of service catering to residents every need. 

*Lifestyle Amenities*

*Convenience*
21 West End offers a 24/7 staffed front desk concierge, a live-in super and management on-site. In addition, a package room and in-house valet service are available: Wash & Fold, Dry Cleaning, and housekeeping are at your fingertips. This is just the start of what 21 West End has to offer!

*Dermot Ignite Club & Community*
When you are ready to unwind, 21 West End offers the exclusive Dermot Ignite Club. Members can experience a full, socially-interactive community. Our in-house managed amenity & social club provides events, such as Game Nights, cooking and mixology classes taught by well-heeled professionals, wellness events, happy hours, movie screenings and much more; and all amenity areas are equipped with free Wi-Fi

*Dermot Ignite Fit & Pool*
The Dermot Ignite Fit facility is complete with a yoga studio, kick-boxing room, state of the art exercise machines, including but not limited to Peloton Bikes, a Smith Machine, and Stairmaster to name a few. The indoor pool facility is designed to be an active retreat for the whole family. While offering restorative hot baths, sauna, lounge space for adults, its also a fun place for the kids to play and enjoy the built-in cinema screen for feature entertainment.

*Dermot Ignite Lounge & Dermot Ignite Play*
The spacious Residents Lounge with its vaulted ceilings invites our members to generous seating and study/workspace for all to enjoy. For the younger generation, the indoor playscape is home to a larger than-life stegosaurus that is sure to get the kids pumped. Soft surfaces, fun shapes, and bright colors create a year-round social space and home base during rainy days. Even better, low-lying windows built into the bookshelves look into the dog run for fun peekaboo moments for both the pups and kids!

*Dermot Ignite Rooftop*
The rooftop terrace is your exclusive backyard, where you can gather with friends and neighbors. Grills, heaters, lounge-seating, and a lawn are met with an amazing view of the Hudson River. The indoor section includes a full demo kitchen perfect for catered private events making you the ultimate host!

*Dermot Ignite Multi-purpose Room, Wine Cellar & Golf Simulator*
The wine cellar hosts tastings and has climate-controlled lockers for resident use. There is a golf-simulator, a private club room, and a private dining room with a hosting kitchen for your next dinner party.

*Dermot Ignite Dog Spa & Dog Run*
The indoor dog spa and dog run are amazing areas for rainy days and cold winter weather. Doggie Daycare is offered during the weekdays for you 4-legged companions to make friends of their own!

*Our Neighborhood*
The neighborhood is our unspoken amenity. Right across the street is Harrys Table, and Empellon Taqueria for a lovely lunch or dinner experience. Both Riverside and Central Parks, Lincoln Center, and the multitude of high-end shopping and retail including The Apple Store, Time Warner Center, Trader Joe's, Zabar's, Lululemon, and Whole Foods. And a variety of trains such as the 1, A, C, B, D conveniently located within walking distance at Columbus Circle to take you wherever you need to go in the city!

title: 100 Claremont Avenue #14D
open_house_desc: Sun, Apr 6 (10:00 AM - 11:30 AM, by appt. only)
description:
Perched high above the city with sweeping eastern views, Residence 14D at Claremont Hall is a sophisticated one-bedroom sanctuary spanning 706 square feet. Bathed in natural light through expansive, high-performance windows, this thoughtfully designed home features an open-concept living and dining area, a windowed bathroom with a luxurious walk-in shower, and a primary bedroom adorned with a striking wall of windows.

Crafted with meticulous attention to detail by the renowned Robert A.M. Stern Architects, Claremont Hall residences boast an exquisite finish palette. The home welcomes you with a custom-designed solid wood entrance door with polished chrome hardware, leading to wide plank European white oak flooring and soaring ceilings up to 10 feet high. Select residences offer grand bay picture windows and Gothic-inspired arched windows, adding a timeless elegance to the space.

The kitchen is a culinary haven, outfitted with custom Italian cabinetry in either Classic Bianco or Modern Grigio lacquer, complemented by Calacatta Laza quartz countertops and a ceramic tile backsplash. A paneled Bosch appliance package, complete with a custom range hood and integrated spice shelf, ensures both style and functionality. Select residences also include a paneled wine refrigerator for the ultimate in convenience.

The primary bathroom is a serene retreat, adorned with Arabescato Cervaiole marble and marble mosaic tile flooring. It features a RAMSA-designed Italian walnut vanity topped with Arabescato Cervaiole marble, polished chrome fixtures by Kallista, a custom mirrored medicine cabinet by Robern, and water closet fixtures by Toto.

Claremont Hall’s extensive amenities span three floors, offering spaces for relaxation, work, and social gatherings. The crown jewel is the Refectory Pool, a historic dining hall transformed into a 48-foot saltwater swimming and event space. Additional amenities include a grand double-height lobby, a Reading Room with the Great Books Collection, a state-of-the-art Gymnasium with Flex Space, the whimsical Little Castle playroom, a media room, and a Residents’ Lounge and Terrace with views of tranquil Sakura Park. Residents also enjoy the convenience of a concierge, handyman, porters, and a live-in resident manager, as well as access to a bicycle room, on-site parking, and private storage for purchase.

Experience the perfect blend of timeless elegance and modern luxury at Claremont Hall.

title: 424 West End Avenue #611
description:
*SHOWINGS BY APPOINTMENT ONLY.* Newly renovated south facing two bedroom, two bathroom home with modern finishes, bright exposure and a large private balcony. It features hardwood floors, a great layout, and large living space. The open kitchen faces the living room and has stainless steel appliances, custom cabinetry, and quartz countertops. The layout features two winged bedrooms, offering both privacy and an efficient floor plan. The bathroom has been renovated with modern flooring. Excellent storage space with five large closets including a huge walk in closet in the master bedroom. Amenities include 24-hour doorman and concierge, valet, on premise 24-hour parking garage, and laundry on every floor. In addition, there is a penthouse-level amenity floor that includes a stunning landscaped and furnished roof terrace with Central Park and Hudson River views, fitness center, resident lounge, childrens playroom, party room and three racquetball courts in arguably the Upper West Side's best location. Security Deposit: At Manhattan Skyline, we are always looking for ways to make your life easier. Never pay a security deposit again. We accept SDR through TheGuarantors which charges a small monthly fee. TheGuarantors directly insures your landlord for your apartment, so you dont need to worry. Lease Guarantors: We make it easy for you to secure a lease by working closely with third-party guarantors such as Insurent and TheGuarantors. Contact our On-Site Leasing Agent for more information. Images are representative of our apartment renovations; are virtually staged and may not be of the actual unit. 
 
 West River House is one of the very few rental residences on sought-after West End Avenue. Perfectly situated at 81st Street on Manhattans renowned Upper West Side, the building offers spacious, generously sized apartments ranging in size from one to three bedrooms. Many of the buildings residences offer features such as windowed eat-in-kitchens, wood-burning fireplaces, large picture windows, terraces and balconies to take full advantage of the dramatic Hudson River and city views. Top floor apartments feature 10 high ceilings. One of the few post-war properties on West End Avenue, West River House offers an unusually large number of building amenities. These include a fully equipped health club with all new TechnoGym equipment, two Peloton bikes, a children's playroom, a rec room/function room for parties and three racquetball courts all located on the penthouse level. And an enormous, landscaped roof sundeck. The elevator accesses directly to the Amenity Center on the Penthouse Level. Additional luxury services include 24 hour doorman, Skys the Limit Concierge Services, valet, a laundry room on every floor and an attended parking garage.

title: 100 Claremont Avenue #34A
open_house_desc: Sun, Apr 6 (3:00 PM - 4:00 PM, by appt. only)
description:
Spanning 1,710 sf of finely detailed living space and occupying Claremont Hall's most
desirable corner, Residence 34A is a three-bedroom, two-bathroom home with a
powder room. This residence offers sweeping southern and western views over the
Hudson River, Riverside and Central Parks, and the iconic spire of Riverside
Cathedral. 34A is centered on a bright and sunny corner living and dining room
that adjoins both a covered outdoor loggia and a windowed kitchen that can be
elegantly concealed behind a solid wood pocket door. The west-facing primary
bedroom suite incorporates a five-fixture bathroom with a deep soaking tub and
large glass-enclosed walk-in shower, and a walk-in closet. Two additional
bedrooms share this residence's spectacular views over the Hudson River, as
well as a conveniently located hall bath.

Displaying a refined finish palette hand-selected by Robert A.M.
Stern Architects, all residences at Claremont Hall include a custom-designed
solid wood entrance door with polished chrome hardware, wide plank European
white oak flooring, expansive, high-performance windows, and up to 10'
ceilings. The kitchens features custom cabinetry topped by quartz
countertops and backed by a ceramic tile backsplash and a paneled appliance
package from Bosch, with a custom range hood with included spice shelf and wine
refrigerator The primary and secondary baths are finished with marble and custom
sconces in polished chrome.

34A has a glorious private outdoor loggias with view of
Riverside Cathedral spire. Each residence conveniently features a washer and dryer
by Bosch.

Claremont Hall's robust amenities span over three floors and
include spaces for socializing, computer time, and relaxing. The experience is
centered on the Refectory Pool, a grand historic dining hall transformed into a
swimming and events space, featuring a 48' salt-water swimming pool. Claremont
Hall is complete with a grand, double-height lobby, a Reading Room with Great
Books Collection, a Gymnasium with Flex Space, the Little Castle playroom,
media room, and a Residents' Lounge and Terrace overlooking tranquil Sakura
Park. The building also features a concierge, handyman, porters, and a live-in
resident manager, as well as a bicycle room, and the opportunity to purchase
on-site parking and private storage.

Available
on or about April 15, pending condo waiver.

Make yourself at home in this fully-furnished ultra-quiet and charming one-bedroom plus a bonus room, offering incredible flexibility as a home office, den, or second bedroom. Located on a beautiful, tree-lined street in the heart of the Columbia neighborhood, this move-in-ready apartment is just half a block from the Cathedral of St. John the Divine (and the beloved

The spacious living and dining area features a custom-built banquette with storage, while the living room boasts a custom built-in with bookshelves, a wine rack, and dimmable lighting. Storage is exceptional, with a wall of custom-built closets lining the bedroom and separate office/den. The bathroom is elegantly finished with subway tiles, Carrera marble countertops, and Kohler fixtures.

504 West 111th Street is a turn-of-the-century, landmarked co-op building offering a part-time doorman, resident superintendent, bike storage, additional storage, and a central laundry room. Pet-friendly and welcoming to pied- -terres and guarantors.

description:
Spacious, northeast-facing 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom home located on the 4th floor. *Please note that the 4th floor is ground level on this side of the community*

This apartment home is equipped with stainless steel kitchen with island, hardwood flooring, and floor-to-ceiling windows. *In-unit washer and dryer included!*

Avalon Morningside Park, located near Morningside Park and Central Park, is a luxury high-rise building offering amenities such as a 24-hour attended lobby, fitness center, co-working space, resident lounge, common area Wi-Fi access, on-site storage, Amazon Hub lockers, and garage with valet parking.

This Upper Manhattan gem is just moments away from the 110th Street 1 and A,B,C subway lines and is within walking distance of several restaurants, cafes, parks, and shopping.

*Please note this listing includes photos of a representative unit. Price is subject to change.*
